text: G major (or the key of G) is a major scale based on G, with the pitches G, A, B, C, D, E, F, and G. Its key signature has one sharp, F. Its relative minor is E minor, and its parallel minor is G minor. == In popular culture == G major is the most common key for music to be in on the Spotify music streaming service. The key can easily be played on either a piano or a guitar, hence why it appears often in music. ==References== Category:Musical keys Category:Major scales
title: G major
